title: v1.6.3 UID Robustness Pattern
details:
Quick Tab ID generation uses multi-layer defense:
1. crypto.getRandomValues() for 64-bit secure randomness
2. Tab-specific component: qt-{tabId}-{timestamp}-{random}
3. Collision detection with retry loop (MAX_ID_GENERATION_RETRIES=10)
4. generatedIds Set tracks all IDs ever generated in session

Location: src/features/quick-tabs/index.js - generateId(), _generateSecureRandom(), _generateIdCandidate()
